summary: Two of the three previously reported issues remain unaddressed; the JWT timing comparison is fixed, but service initialization handling and pagination bounds are not.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: getRevenueRulesService throws outside of try/catch, causing unhandled exceptions when service is uninitialized
previous_issues_status.notes: The current code still throws in getRevenueRulesService() and callers do not guard against it.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: JWT signature comparison uses direct string comparison (timing unsafe)
previous_issues_status.notes: Now uses timingSafeEqual with length check.
The limit is still parsed with `parseInt(... ) || 50` without clamping.
